name: Engineering Classification of Soil | Sughandha R/A, Chittagong
description: As part of our geotechnical engineering course (CE 332), we had the opportunity to undertake a significant lab project under the guidance of CUET professors and the Civil Engineering Department.

name: Structural Design and Analysis of a Residential Building
description: According to the Bangladesh National Building Code (BNBC 2020), this project is for a 10-storied residential building situated on a 14,400 square-foot plot.

description: This repository is created to help you listen to the Quran in Bangla without needing to go to YouTube every time. Enjoy the divine words of Allah with ease and convenience!
